summary: QuissMe v2.1 testing completed. Backend: 100% pass rate (9/9 tests). All new quiz clusters verified - 23 quizzes total with correct sector distribution. Reibung/Reparatur (4 questions) and Couples (1 question) quiz structures confirmed. Full cycle tests passed for both new quiz types. Frontend: Explore tab working perfectly showing all 23 quizzes across 3 sectors. Dashboard Home tab quiz wheel API verified but UI testing blocked by onboarding form submission issue.

integration_issues.issue: Berechnen button on onboarding form (Astrologisches Profil) does not trigger navigation after filling all fields. Form validation may be failing or button click event not registered. This blocks testing of Dashboard Home tab quiz wheel visualization.
integration_issues.workaround: Direct URL navigation to /explore works. Backend quiz wheel API confirmed working.

react_native_issues.issue: useNativeDriver not supported - Expected React Native Web limitation
shadow* props deprecated warnings - Expected React Native Web migration

action_items: Main agent: Investigate onboarding form (app/onboarding.tsx or similar) - Berechnen button click not triggering navigation. Check form validation, API call handling, and navigation logic.
Main agent: Once onboarding flow is fixed, verify Dashboard Home tab shows Quiz Wheel with gradient background, sector dots, sector labels, and all 23 quiz nodes positioned correctly by sector.

success_rate.frontend: 75% (Explore tab working, Dashboard Home blocked by onboarding issue)

seed_data_creation: 23 quizzes auto-seeded from 3 JSON files. Test users created with TEST_V21_ prefix for cycle testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: v2.1 backend fully functional. All 23 quizzes (5 love_languages + 3 reibung_reparatur + 15 couples) verified. Sector distribution correct (7 passion, 10 stability, 6 future). Explore tab shows all quizzes correctly. Onboarding form submission issue blocks Dashboard Home testing - needs main agent fix before full UI verification.
